meaningMnemonic: There is a <radical>mountain</radical> on top of a bunch of <radical>dirt</radical> with a steep <radical>cliff</radical>. This is a bit redundant, but the mountain and the dirt just make the <kanji>cliff</kanji> even bigger and steeper and scarier.
readingMnemonic: You can't believe how big the <kanji>cliff</kanji> is now with the mountain and the dirt. You look at it for so long, you just become another <reading>gawker</reading> (がけ) who can't stop staring at the huge cliff. It really is huge.
